name: Drive Snowmobile Simulator
description:
Drive Snowmobile Simulator
Snowmobile Driving Simulator - a game simulator driving a snowmobile!
Learn to manage snowmobile with help of our app!
You have a choice, to manage snowmobile in the mountains or in the city!
Driving a snowmobile is necessary with a view from the eye!
Try to cope with a snowmobile in a normal city with people and traffic of cars!
Collect cans of gasoline, not to die!
The more flags gather, the more points you get!
Do many races and copy coins! On the money you can buy new snowmobiles!

Learn rules of the road with our app! A ride on a snow vehicle a lot of fun!
Try to make a mad trick on a snowmobile!

Thank you for playing our apps! Leave us feedback and evaluation, and we try to make our games even more interesting!
